title: slanted techno sans "Studio"
content: This typeface looks somewhat like a bastardized Eurostile but thought I'd run a whatsit thread before I go through the trouble of recreating it. ![studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141917im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23460.jpg)
author: denali

comments.content: There's not much connection to Eurostile in this except that it is squarish. I don't have much time for hunting right now, but [T-26](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141917/http:/www.t26.com/) has about the largest 'Techno" collection of any regular foundry, and it might be worth a look through that selection. 'Luggage' and 'Phuture' are two fonts I seem to recall might resemble this better than Eurostile.
